title: One More Valentine
description: When Mei Barnes was eighteen, she saw Miles Jefferson across a crowded room and knew immediately that he would be the love of her life. The first time Miles saw Mei, he knew that whatever he did for the rest of his life would be to make himself worthy of her love. For fifteen years, their relationship was easy and joyful, until it wasn’t.It's been three years since the divorce and the only thing time had given them was more pain until their best friends, Ezra and Candace, reunited over New Year’s Eve. When they get the invitation to fly to Paris to celebrate their new relationship, Miles and Mei agree out of love and loyalty to their friends. Reuniting for one more Valentine’s Day together dredges up all their old hurts, but also two decades of a love written on their souls.
author: Katrina Jackson
